alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Rusk; Smith; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Smith, northwestern Rusk, south central Upshur and southwestern Gregg Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 647 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Overton, or 10 miles west of Kilgore, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Longview, Kilgore, Whitehouse, White Oak, Gladewater, Overton, New London, Arp, Clarksville City, East Mountain, Liberty City, New Chapel Hill, Winona, Union Grove, Warren City and Laird Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
